name: continuous
readme:
# build scripts for Tessel

easy mode:

```
./all.sh
```

## Hard Mode

make a `stage` folder. Put into it the following files
```
stage/tessel-cli.tar.gz
stage/tessel-cli-changelog.md
stage/tessel-firmware.bin
stage/tessel-firmware-changelog.md
stage/tessel-firmware-info.json
```

now run `node publish.js [-f firmware version] [-c cli version] [-min minimum required cli version] [-max required cli version]`

min_cli and max_cli are both optional, but -f or -c must exist to upload firmware/cli.
